articles.description: Footage shows two sharks claiming the catch alongside the boat.
articles.content:
A prominent South Florida angler says the state has a "shark problem" and shared graphic footage Sunday showing bull sharks attacking a hooked sailfish to illustrate his claim.
Another sailfish lost… [+773 chars]

articles.title: 10 Teeny Tiny Chevrotains: Meet The Smallest Hoofed Mammals On Earth - IFLScience
articles.description: The biggest mouse-deer only weighs up to 15 kilograms (33 pounds), about the same as a cocker spaniel.
articles.content: A group of teeny tiny mouse-deer in the family Tragulidae numbers 10 species that live in warmer parts of Southeast Asia, India, and Africa. They are small, delicate, and extremely elusive: they are … [+2443 chars]
